import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete pending workflow approval"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/workflow/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes a pending approval workflow from a ticket. This cancels any outstanding approval request and returns the ticket to its previous workflow state.

**Behavior**
- Removes the approval requirement from the ticket
- Does not delete the ticket itself
- Ticket returns to previous workflow state
- Any pending approval notifications are cancelled

**Use Cases**
- Cancelling an approval request that is no longer needed
- Removing approval workflow when requirements change
- Allowing ticket to proceed without approval

**Prerequisites**
- Ticket must have a pending approval workflow
- Caller must have permission to manage ticket workflows

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket with pending approval to delete","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
